servinfo.title: Front Drive Shaft Assembly Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Undo caulking (1) and remove drive shaft nut (2).
Disconnect tie-rod end from steering knuckle referring to Steering Knuckle Removal and Installation .
Remove stabilizer joint from stabilizer bar.
Remove suspension control arm referring to Suspension Control Arm Removal and Installation .
Remove front drive shaft flange nuts (1).
Remove drive shaft assembly from front differential.

attention2.ptxt: To prevent breakage of boots (wheel side and differential side), do not contact them with other parts when removing drive shaft assembly.

servinfosub.title: Installation

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage oil seals and boots when installing drive shaft.
Do not hit joint boot with hammer.
Inserting joint only by hands is allowed.
Make sure that differential side joint is inserted fully and its snap ring is seated as it was.

servinfosub.ptxt: Install drive shaft assembly by reversing removal procedure and noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Tighten each bolts and nuts to the specified torque referring to Front Drive Shaft Components:Front and Front Suspension Construction .
